summary: This is an email from a Special Assistant to the U.S. Attorney in the SDNY, transmitting multiple PDF attachments. The email itself is a cover note for a batch of documents, likely related to the Epstein case, sent on August 5, 2020.

persons.name: Special Assistant to the U.S. Attorney
persons.role: Special Assistant to the U.S. Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email transmitting a batch of PDF documents from the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Document Transmission
events.description: A Special Assistant to the U.S. Attorney sends an email transmitting multiple PDF documents related to the Epstein case.
personsInvolved: Special Assistant to the U.S. Attorney

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 5, 2020, from a Special Assistant to the U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
The email's purpose is to transmit a large batch of PDF documents, with file names suggesting they are part of a series (SDNY_GM_00000834 through SDNY_GM_00000962).
The document identifier EFTA00084601 is noted, linking it to the Epstein case document set.
